summary: Art of the Prank is an emotional and humorous journey following the evolution of Joey Skaggs, Godfather of the media hoax, as he tries to pull off the most challenging prank of his career. ... See full summary Â»
cast: Mark Borkowski|Michael Carter|Manulele Clark|Ed Coll|Larry Croft|Warren Dastrup|Judy Drosd|Jim Edmonds|Sarah Kit Farrell|Robert Forster|Colby Johnson|Jeff Johnson|Richard Johnson|Sara Jones|Peter Maloney|Paul Massey|Kate McCamy|Reverend Jen Miller|Steve Powers|Richard Ruiz|Norman Savage|Dorothy Skaggs|Jessie Skaggs|Joey Skaggs|Max Skaggs|Jerry Smith|Tom Tenney|Charlie Todd|Verne Williams|Buck Wolf
title: Art of the Prank
